level.text: Use as an electric substation with nonrotating equipment, natural gas regulator station, or public utility pumping station shall be permitted as a special exception in an R-1 District if approved by the Board of Zoning Adjustment under ยง 3104, subject to the provisions of this section.
The uses listed in ยง 207.1 shall be subject to any requirements for setbacks, screening, or other safeguards that the Board deems necessary for the protection of the neighborhood.
